about_the_game:
Galaxy Drift is a high-speed isometric racer inspired by classics from the 8-bit and 16-bit era. Reach astronomical speeds and defy the laws of physics as you warp past planets, stars and black holes in an adrenaline-fueled race across the Galaxy. Choose from a diverse cast of pilots that represent the many civilizations that span across the Galaxy. Compete in the Galaxy Drift league to become Galactic Champion or race your friend in 2 player split-screen mode.

Galaxy Drift Features
  • 8+ pilots with Unique Vehicles.
  • 3 separate League Cups with 3 tracks each.
  • Full gamepad support
  • Local Multiplayer (2 Player Split-Screen)
  • Online and Local Time Trial leaderboards

New Camera Options
As of Galaxy Drift v1.05, you can now adjust the camera height. Experience a customized view of the track that fits your needs.


Control Options
Galaxy Drift offers three distinct ways to control your vehicle during a race. Choose from classic, directional and mouse steering, each of which will appeal to different style of players. Experimenting is easy as you can change control methods at any time!

Classic
Classic controls mimic traditional isometric racing controls where the vehicle turns based on its own perspective and not the player.


Directional
Directional controls turn the vehicle in any direction based on the perspective of the player.


Mouse Steering
Mouse Steering is a special single player only control method in which you pilot the vehicle using the mouse only. The distance from the vehicle to the cursor determines speed and turning speed.




Track Selection
Race across 9 tracks through 3 Cups, each with its own unique setting and music track. Master these tracks and dominate the competition to claim the Galaxy Drift League Championship.





Racer Selection
Select from 8+ racers, each with a unique vehicle and varied stats. Each racer has their strengths and weakness, pick your favorite or the one best suited for the current track.



Grand Prix Mode
Choose Grand Prix mode to race against the competition in consecutive races. You need to get top 3 to unlock the next cup. Get first in all cups to become the Galaxy Drift League champion.



While racing through the Grand Prix mode, you can also find secret emblems in each track. Find them all to unlock special rewards!

Leaderboards

Test your skills in Time Trial mode. Push your racer to the limit and achieve the best time on each track. Save your best time to the local leaderboards or upload to Steam and share your triumph with others.



Soundtrack
Included with the game is the amazing soundtrack by H4MSTER.
